name: Shadow Miner
description:
You were kidnapped in order to work in the mine because your small size allows you to reach very remote places. However the mine collapsed and you were able to escape. In search of your freedom, you must avoid eye surveillance so as not to be found. Run ..., quickly and do not look back!

Made for Hackaton42 by 4 motivated individuals this game mixes cute designs and a mysterious storyline.

We would like to thank:

Our talented developpers: Louis Thievent and François-Louis Talleux

Our Sound/Social media manager: Foulématou Dramé

Our designer: Elina Jankovskaja

We all sincerely hope to continue this game out of the competition to make it more playable.
